dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1008 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 298 Route 292 in Holmes, New York, as the “Sheriff Adrian Butch Anderson Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler (for himself, Mr. Garbarino, Mr. Kennedy of New York, Ms. Malliotakis, Mr. Morelle, Ms. Meng, Mr. Ryan, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Tonko, Mr. Torres of New York, and Mr. Latimer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 298 Route 292 in Holmes, New York, as the Sheriff Adrian Butch Anderson Post Office Building.

section.header: Sheriff Adrian Butch Anderson Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 298 Route 292 in Holmes, New York, shall be known and designated as the Sheriff Adrian Butch Anderson Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sheriff Adrian Butch Anderson Post Office Building.
